SELECT A.PLNT_CD, A.ANS_IDX, A.RCP_DT, NVL(B.EMG_YN, 'N') AS EMG_YN, A.ANS_NO, A.REQ_DT, A.PITM_SPEC_IDX, F.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = F.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, F.PITM_CD, F.PITM_NM, G.LOT_NO, A.REQ_RMK, A.RCP_RMK, A.ASS_SPCC, G.MAK_DT, G.ETR_DT, G.SPL_LOT_NO, G.USE_LMT, A.CLLT_RMK, A.CLLT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.CLLT_UID AND PLNT_CD = A.PLNT_CD) AS CLLT_NM, A.CLLT_DT, A.CPL_RQM_DT, A.ASS_NO, A.ASS_DT, G.SPL_CD, G.SPL_NM, A.REQ_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.REQ_UID AND PLNT_CD = A.PLNT_CD) AS REQ_NM, A.REQ_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE DPT_CD = A.REQ_DPT_CD AND PLNT_CD = A.PLNT_CD) AS REQ_DPT_NM, G.ETR_QTY, G.INP_UNIT, A.RJT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RJT_UID AND PLNT_CD = A.PLNT_CD) AS RJT_NM, TO_CHAR(A.RJT_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RJT_DS, A.RJT_REA, A.ANS_PROC_CD, A.OOS_YN, A.REVW_CMMT, A.SYT_JDG, A.REVW_DT, F.PITM_EN, B.ANS_FILE_IDX AS FILE_IDX, ((SELECT COUNT(FILE_SRLNO) FROM SY_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_IDX = B.ANS_FILE_IDX AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD) || '건') AS FILE_CNT, F.CRG_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE DPT_CD = F.CRG_DPT_CD AND PLNT_CD = F.PLNT_CD) AS CRG_DPT_NM, B.NON_CFM_REA, B.PITM_SPCC, G.BATCH_NO, G.ISP_REQ_NO, G.PHS_ORDER_NO, G.PDT_ORDER_NO FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC A JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.ANS_IDX = B.ANS_IDX JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC D ON A.PLNT_CD = D.PLNT_CD AND A.PITM_SPEC_IDX = D.PITM_SPEC_IDX JOIN QM_PITM E ON D.PLNT_CD = E.PLNT_CD AND D.PITM_CD = E.PITM_CD AND D.PITM_VER = E.PITM_VER JOIN QM_PITM_INFO F ON E.PLNT_CD = F.PLNT_CD AND E.PITM_CD = F.PITM_CD AND E.PITM_VER = F.PITM_VER JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ G ON A.PLNT_CD = G.PLNT_CD AND A.REQ_IDX = G.REQ_IDX WHERE A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.ANS_PROC_CD IN (#{testProcessList[0]}, #{testProcessList[1]}) AND A.HLD_YN = 'N' AND A.REVW_UID IN ( ${withDelegateUserIds} )
AND F.PITM_TYP = #{pitmTyp}
AND UPPER(F.PITM_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pitmCd}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.ANS_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{ansNo}) || '%'
AND UPPER(G.LOT_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{lotNo}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.ASS_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{assNo}) || '%'
AND UPPER(F.PITM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pitmNm}) || '%'
AND A.REQ_DT BETWEEN #{searchReqDt[0]} AND #{searchReqDt[1]}
ORDER BY B.EMG_YN DESC, A.ANS_IDX, A.REQ_IDX

SELECT C.PLNT_CD, A.REQ_IDX, C.ANS_IDX, C.RST_SEQ, C.RST_FILE_IDX AS FILE_IDX, A.PITM_SPEC_IDX, F.PITM_TYP, F.PITM_CD, F.PITM_NM, I.AITM_CD, I.AITM_KN, H.VRIA_NO, H.VRIA_KN, C.ANS_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE DPT_CD = C.ANS_DPT_CD AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS ANS_DPT_NM, C.ANS_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = C.ANS_UID AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS ANS_NM, C.PERSPEC_TXT, C.OWC_SPEC_TXT, C.SPEC_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.SPEC_TYP) AS SPEC_TYP_NM, C.JDG_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.JDG_TYP) AS JDG_TYP_NM, (DECODE(SUBSTR(C.RST_VAL, 0, 4), 'U008', (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.RST_VAL AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD), RST_VAL)) AS RST_VAL, C.MARK_VAL, C.RST_UNIT_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.RST_UNIT_CD AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS RST_UNIT_NM, C.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM, C.RST_JDG, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.RST_JDG) AS RST_JDG_NM, C.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL, C.RST_RMK, C.ANS_RST_INP_DS, C.RST_DPNT, C.PER_SLV_LOW, C.PER_SLV_UPP, C.PER_SLV_DESC, C.OWC_SLV_LOW, C.OWC_SLV_UPP, C.OWC_SLV_DESC, C.RPT_PRT_YN, A.ANS_PROC_CD, C.RST_PROC_CD, A.ANS_NO, G.LOT_NO, G.BATCH_NO, C.AMITM_CD, J.LAB_EVT_IDX, J.LAB_EVT_APR_IDX, K.APR_YN, NVL(G.PHS_ORDER_NO, G.PDT_ORDER_NO) AS ORDER_NO, C.SLV_JDG_CFM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.SLV_JDG_CFM AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NM, C.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = C.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM_NM, ((SELECT COUNT(FILE_SRLNO) FROM SY_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_IDX = C.RST_FILE_IDX AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD) || '건') AS FILE_CNT, C.MKR_QTY, C.AITM_RMK FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC A JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.ANS_IDX = B.ANS_IDX JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_RST C ON A.PLNT_CD = C.PLNT_CD AND A.ANS_IDX = C.ANS_IDX JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC D ON A.PLNT_CD = D.PLNT_CD AND A.PITM_SPEC_IDX = D.PITM_SPEC_IDX JOIN QM_PITM E ON D.PLNT_CD = E.PLNT_CD AND D.PITM_CD = E.PITM_CD AND D.PITM_VER = E.PITM_VER JOIN QM_PITM_INFO F ON E.PLNT_CD = F.PLNT_CD AND E.PITM_CD = F.PITM_CD AND E.PITM_VER = F.PITM_VER JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ G ON A.PLNT_CD = G.PLNT_CD AND A.REQ_IDX = G.REQ_IDX JOIN MS_AMITM H ON C.AMITM_CD = H.AMITM_CD JOIN MS_AITM I ON H.AITM_CD = I.AITM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN QE_LAB_EVT J ON C.ANS_IDX = J.ANS_IDX AND C.RST_SEQ = J.RST_SEQ AND C.PLNT_CD = J.PLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SY_APR_INFO K ON J.LAB_EVT_APR_IDX = K.APR_IDX AND J.PLNT_CD = K.PLNT_CD WHERE A.ANS_IDX = #{ansIdx} AND A.ANS_PROC_CD IN (#{testProcessList[0]}, #{testProcessList[1]}) AND A.HLD_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.RST_PROC_CD = #{rstProcCd} ORDER BY C.RST_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE QT_PITM_ANS_PROC SET SYT_JDG = #{sytJdg}, REVW_UID = #{revwUid}, REVW_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), REVW_DS = SYSDATE, REVW_CMMT = #{revwCmmt}, ANS_PROC_CD = #{ansProcCd}, RST_APR_REQ_IDX = #{rstAprReqIdx} WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND ANS_IDX = #{ansIdx}

UPDATE QT_PITM_ANS_PROC SET HLD_YN = 'Y', HLD_DS = SYSDATE, HLD_UID = #{hldUid}, HLD_REA = #{hldRea}, HLD_CANL_DS = NULL, HLD_CANL_UID = NULL, HLD_CANL_REA = NULL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND ANS_IDX = #{ansIdx}
